snippet: Price spent his career working with clay in ways unlike anyone else, breathing new life into the medium as he pushed it from the functional to the abstract.
abstract: Price spent his career working with clay in ways unlike anyone else, breathing new life into the medium as he pushed it from the functional to the abstract.
